name: Midnight Tales VOL.2
description:
Midnight Tales VOL.2 is a horror game set in the 80's and 90's with PS1 style graphics. Inspired by the famous "Tales From The Crypt" they bring the games of the series a unique experience with four little horrors. In addition, a story mode that frames the four games in another even more macabre reality.

STORY MODE:

Josh is passionate about bizarre horror games... He receives an unusual visitor at his home, a man dressed in black wearing a mask. Now he'll have to do some pretty weird and bloody tasks to be able to play new horror games.

The story mode brings together all the games to add more to the story together and bring more immersion to the players.

Three games + Story Mode + Bonus:

Midnight Tales VOL.2 features a story mode that combines 3 short horror games into one. Plus a bonus game for horror lovers.

- STAY AT HOUSE

- JUST ONE NIGHT

- THE SECRET OF LIGHTHOUSE

- BLOODY CHAINSAW (BONUS)

CHARACTERISTICS:

Gameplay: First person.

Camera Style: VHS, 1995, Distorted, Pixelate.

Graphics: PS1/PS2 style with low polish.

Story: Full story with four games, story mode is most recommended.

Soundtrack: The game's music seeks to create an even greater immersion for the player to feel in the 80s.

NOTE:

This is a game inspired by the cult horror movies of the 80's and 90's... It has an over-the-top horror with a slight touch of acid comedy. Contains explicit violence, corpses, mutilations and lots, lots of weirdness...
